sentences.en: Can you can a can as a cannery cans can?
sentences.cn: 这句绕口令的意思是:你能向罐头厂那样装罐头 吗 ?

sentences.en: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.cn: 就在近几年，最后的沙丁鱼罐头工厂，在缅因州关门了。

sentences.en: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.cn: 仅仅在过去的几年里，缅因州的最后几家沙丁鱼罐头厂也倒闭了。

sentences.en: The cannery was abandoned almost as soon as it was built.
sentences.cn: 罐头厂几乎刚成立就废弃了.

sentences.en: Tongue Twister : Can you can a can as a cannery cans can?
sentences.cn: 你能像罐头厂那样装罐头 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a factory where food is put into cans
